1.name: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
1.description: Journalist Mikael Blomkvist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing for forty years by Lisbeth Salander, a young computer hacker.

2.name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
2.description: Harry, Ron, and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.

3.name: The Intouchables
3.description: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

4.name: Miss Bala
4.description: After entering a beauty contest in Tijuana, a young woman witnesses drug-related murders and is forced to do the gang's bidding.

5.name: Just Go with It
5.description: On a weekend trip to Hawaii, a plastic surgeon convinces his loyal assistant to pose as his soon-to-be-divorced wife in order to cover up a careless lie he told to his much-younger girlfriend.

6.name: The Help
6.description: An aspiring author during the civil rights movement of the 1960s decides to write a book detailing the African American maids' point of view on the white families for which they work, and the hardships they go through on a daily basis.

7.name: Warrior
7.description: The youngest son of an alcoholic former boxer returns home, where he's trained by his father for competition in a mixed martial arts tournament - a path that puts the fighter on a collision course with his estranged, older brother.

8.name: Captain America: The First Avenger
8.description: Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier transforms into Captain America after taking a dose of a "Super-Soldier serum". But being Captain America comes at a price as he attempts to take down a war monger and a terrorist organization.

9.name: Hanna
9.description: A sixteen-year-old girl who was raised by her father to be the perfect assassin is dispatched on a mission across Europe, tracked by a ruthless intelligence agent and her operatives.

10.name: Thor
10.description: The powerful, but arrogant god Thor, is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.

11.name: Drive
11.description: A mysterious Hollywood stuntman and mechanic moonlights as a getaway driver and finds himself in trouble when he helps out his neighbor.

12.name: Sucker Punch
12.description: A young girl is institutionalized by her abusive stepfather, retreating to an alternative reality as a coping strategy, envisioning a plan to help her escape.

13.name: Hugo
13.description: In Paris in 1931, an orphan named Hugo Cabret, who lives in the walls of a train station, is wrapped up in a mystery involving his late father and an automaton.

14.name: Crazy, Stupid, Love.
14.description: A middle-aged husband's life changes dramatically when his wife asks him for a divorce. He seeks to rediscover his manhood with the help of a newfound friend, Jacob, learning to pick up girls at bars.

15.name: X: First Class
15.description: In the 1960s, superpowered humans Charles Xavier and Erik Lensherr work together to find others like them, but Erik's vengeful pursuit of an ambitious mutant who ruined his life causes a schism to divide them.

16.name: Bridesmaids
16.description: Competition between the maid of honor and a bridesmaid, over who is the bride's best friend, threatens to upend the life of an out-of-work pastry chef.

17.name: The Cabin in the Woods
17.description: Five friends go for a break at a remote cabin, where they get more than they bargained for, discovering the truth behind the cabin in the woods.

18.name: I Am Number Four
18.description: Aliens and their Guardians are hiding on Earth from intergalactic bounty hunters. They can only be killed in numerical order, and Number Four is next on the list. This is his story.

19.name: In Time
19.description: In a future where people stop aging at 25, but are engineered to live only one more year, having the means to buy your way out of the situation is a shot at immortal youth. Here, Will Salas finds himself accused of murder and on the run with a hostage - a connection that becomes an important part of the way against the system.

20.name: Conan the Barbarian
20.description: A vengeful barbarian warrior sets off to get his revenge on the evil warlord who attacked his village and murdered his father when he was a boy.

21.name: No Strings Attached
21.description: A guy and girl try to keep their relationship strictly physical, but it's not long before they learn that they want something more.

22.name: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
22.description: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.

23.name: Limitless
23.description: With the help of a mysterious pill that enables the user to access one hundred percent of his brain abilities, a struggling writer becomes a financial wizard, but it also puts him in a new world with lots of dangers.

24.name: Source Code
24.description: A soldier wakes up in someone else's body and discovers he's part of an experimental government program to find the bomber of a commuter train. A mission he has only 8 minutes to complete.

25.name: Super 8
25.description: During the summer of 1979, a group of friends witness a train crash and investigate subsequent unexplained events in their small town.

26.name: Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides
26.description: Jack Sparrow and Barbossa embark on a quest to find the elusive fountain of youth, only to discover that Blackbeard and his daughter are after it too.

27.name: Horrible Bosses
27.description: Three friends conspire to murder their awful bosses when they realize they are standing in the way of their happiness.

28.name: Shame
28.description: A man's carefully cultivated private life is disrupted when his sister arrives for an indefinite stay.

29.name: The Adjustment Bureau
29.description: The affair between a politician and a contemporary dancer is affected by mysterious forces keeping the lovers apart.

30.name: Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy
30.description: In the bleak days of the Cold War, espionage veteran George Smiley is forced from semi-retirement to uncover a Soviet Agent within MI6.

31.name: Dream House
31.description: Soon after moving into their seemingly idyllic new home, a family learns of a brutal crime committed against former residents of the dwelling.

32.name: Immortals
32.description: Theseus is a mortal man chosen by Zeus to lead the fight against the ruthless King Hyperion, who is on a rampage across Greece to obtain a weapon that can destroy humanity.

33.name: Midnight in Paris
33.description: While on a trip to Paris with his fiancée's family, a nostalgic screenwriter finds himself mysteriously going back to the 1920s everyday at midnight.

34.name: Melancholia
34.description: Two sisters find their already strained relationship challenged as a mysterious new planet threatens to collide with Earth.

35.name: Unknown
35.description: A man awakens from a coma, only to discover that someone has taken on his identity and that no one, (not even his wife), believes him. With the help of a young woman, he sets out to prove who he is.

36.name: Abduction
36.description: A thriller centered on a young man who sets out to uncover the truth about his life after finding his baby photo on a missing persons website.

37.name: Jane Eyre
37.description: A mousy governess who softens the heart of her employer soon discovers that he's hiding a terrible secret.

38.name: Fast Five
38.description: Dominic Toretto and his crew of street racers plan a massive heist to buy their freedom while in the sights of a powerful Brazilian drug lord and a dangerous federal agent.

39.name: The Grey
39.description: After their plane crashes in Alaska, six oil workers are led by a skilled huntsman to survival, but a pack of merciless wolves haunts their every step.

40.name: Green Lantern
40.description: Reckless test pilot Hal Jordan is granted an alien ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers that inducts him into an intergalactic police force, the Green Lantern Corps.

41.name: We Need to Talk About Kevin
41.description: Kevin's mother struggles to love her strange child, despite the increasingly dangerous things he says and does as he grows up. But Kevin is just getting started, and his final act will be beyond anything anyone imagined.

42.name: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
42.description: Detective Sherlock Holmes is on the trail of criminal mastermind Professor Moriarty, who is carrying out a string of random crimes across Europe.

43.name: Sleeping Beauty
43.description: A haunting portrait of Lucy, a young university student drawn into a mysterious hidden world of unspoken desires.

44.name: One Day
44.description: After spending the night together on the night of their college graduation Dexter and Em are shown each year on the same date to see where they are in their lives. They are sometimes together, sometimes not, on that day.

45.name: Cowboys & Aliens
45.description: A spaceship arrives in Arizona, 1873, to take over the Earth, starting with the Wild West region. A posse of cowboys and natives are all that stand in their way.

46.name: The Tree of Life
46.description: The story of a family in Waco, Texas in 1956. The eldest son witnesses the loss of innocence and struggles with his parents' conflicting teachings.

47.name: The Three Musketeers
47.description: The hot-headed young D'Artagnan along with three former legendary but now down on their luck Musketeers must unite and defeat a beautiful double agent and her villainous employer from seizing the French throne and engulfing Europe in war.

48.name: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
48.description: The Autobots learn of a Cybertronian spacecraft hidden on the moon, and race against the Decepticons to reach it and to learn its secrets.

49.name: Friends with Benefits
49.description: A young man and woman decide to take their friendship to the next level without becoming a couple, but soon discover that adding sex only leads to complications.

50.name: Footloose
50.description: City teenager Ren MacCormack moves to a small town where rock music and dancing have been banned, and his rebellious spirit shakes up the populace.
